column4: Hi folks.  I'm very new to Ubuntu.  I hope you don't mind a clueless idiot type question.  Ubuntu has asked me a couple of times to enter my default keyring password.  I have no idea what it would be.  Help?
not sure but have you tried your normal password?
did you happen to change your primary password prior to this keyrinig problem?
: I don't think so.  I wouldn't know how to do that.
